MRN_SYN_1_style_2: OPERATIVE REPORT: Electromagnetic navigation bronchoscopy (ENB) combined with radial endobronchial ultrasound (REBUS) was utilized to localize a peripheral adenocarcinoma in the left upper lobe. Following confirmation of the probe position, a flexible cryoprobe was deployed. Cryoablation was executed to achieve tumor destruction. The patient tolerated the procedure without adverse events.
